GeneDef.label: insect jelly dependency
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need to ingest insect jelly on a regular basis to survive. After 5 days without insect jelly, carriers will suffer from insect jelly deficiency. After 30 days, they will fall into a coma. After 60 days, they will die.
GeneDef.resourceDescription: A need by {PAWN_nameDef} to consume insect jelly
